sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-row>
    <el-col v-if="!isLogin" :span="4" :offset="18">
      <el-button  type="primary" @click="login">登录</el-button>
      <el-dialog :visible="loginDialog">
        <el-form ref="form" :model="User" label-width="80px">
          <el-form-item label="学号">
            <el-input :model="User.name"></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
          <el-form-item label="密码">
            <el-input :model="User.password"></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-form>
      </el-dialog>
    </el-col>
    <el-col v-if="isLogin" :span="4" :offset="18">
      <el-button icon="el-icon-user-solid" circle></el-button>
      {{User.name}}, {{User.phoneNumber}}
    </el-col>
  </el-row>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "head",
  data() {
    return {
      isLogin: true,
      User: {
        name: '张三',
        phoneNumber: '202034340099',
        password: ''
      },
      loginDialog: false
    }
  },
  methods: {
    login() {
      this.loginDialog= true;

    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
  .el-row {
    padding: 5px;
    height: 50px;
    background-color: #F2F6FC;
  }
  .el-icon-user-solid {

  }
</style>
